title: Today’s hot topics: Climate change poker, Bernie’s abortion quota, Biden’s floater, media toters, CPAC Minnesota, and more!
text:
Today on The Ed Morrissey Show (4 pm ET), we have another great lineup for the news of the day! The show will be streamed on Hot Air’s Facebook page and embedded here and on the show page for those who are not on Facebook.

Join us as we welcome:

Duane “Generalissimo” Patterson brings us up to date on the week’s top stories and gives us a preview of tomorrow’s Hugh Hewitt show. We’ll review the latest nuttiness from last nights climate-change marathon on CNN, including Joe Biden’s mystery bloody eyeball and how the media studiously ignored it. Will Democrats make population control through abortion a key plank in their platform? Duane and I will also debate Brexit and determine which of us is a great big girl’s blouse and which is a chlorinated chicken.

No seriously, the Brits really know insults, right?

Can conservatives turn Minnesota away from its current status as a progressive playground? Ian Walters tells us about next week’s CPAC Minnesota being staged by the American Conservative Union right here in the Twin Cities. It takes place on September 11 with the theme Some People Did Something, and it will take a positive look at our first responders and the challenges conservatives face here in the Land of 10,000 Lakes.



The Ed Morrissey Show and its dynamic chatroom can be seen on the permanent TEMS page. Be sure to join us, and don’t forget to keep up with the debate on my Facebook page, too!

How can Republicans and conservatives keep winning after 2016? Find out in GOING RED, published in April from Crown Forum!
description: Duane Patterson and Ian Walters at 4 pm ET!
